resources.string: After founding that Children spend more time using home smart phones by playing games than spending time using their notebooks, And also now days parents are very busy with their work due to the development effect.
The manual system has a lot of influence that causing big problem that hold us to come up with an idea of developing a mobile App that can help parents in kids coaching.
All books you have seen in this app are not for us, we a make research by avoiding some mistakes.
